method.text: In a large saucepan, heat the oil and fry the chicken until brown all over. Remove and set aside.
In the same pan, add the onions. Fry until lightly browned. Add the chicken with the tomatoes, tomato puree and garlic. Cook for 5 min.
Add the stock, oregano and seasoning. Cover. Cook for 30 min.

Add the prepared okra. Shake the pan to spread the okra evenly over the chicken. Season to taste. Cover. Cook gently for 20 min. The casserole should not be stirred during this time, but occasionally give the pan a gently shake. Serve.

title: Chicken and okra casserole
